CodeEditorModel.Text:
Sub IncrementAmountPump1 'Temporary value set to 0' Temp_Size = 0 'Set to value after increment' Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive1Increment) 'if bigger, set Output to max value' If Temp_Size > AdditiveControl(0).ScalingValue Then AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue = AdditiveControl(0).ScalingValue Else 'If the value is less than maximum value, increment value' If AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue < 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(0).ButtonPosEnable = False AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive1Increment)
Else 'Else disable increment button' AdditiveControl(0).ButtonPosEnable = True End If
End If End Sub Sub IncrementAmountPump2 'Temporary value set to 0' Temp_Size = 0 'Set to value after increment' Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive2Increment) 'if bigger, set Output to max value' If Temp_Size > AdditiveControl(1).ScalingValue Then AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue = AdditiveControl(1).ScalingValue Else 'If the value is less than maximum value, increment value' If AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue < 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(1).ButtonPosEnable = False AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive2Increment)
Else 'Else disable increment button' AdditiveControl(1).ButtonPosEnable = True End If
End If End Sub Sub IncrementAmountPump3 'Temporary value set to 0' Temp_Size = 0 'Set to value after increment' Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive3Increment) 'if bigger, set Output to max value' If Temp_Size > AdditiveControl(2).ScalingValue Then AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue = AdditiveControl(2).ScalingValue Else 'If the value is less than maximum value, increment value' If AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue < 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(2).ButtonPosEnable = False AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive3Increment)
Else 'Else disable increment button' AdditiveControl(2).ButtonPosEnable = True End If
End If End Sub Sub IncrementAmountPump4 'Temporary value set to 0' Temp_Size = 0 'Set to value after increment' Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive4Increment) 'if bigger, set Output to max value' If Temp_Size > AdditiveControl(3).ScalingValue Then AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue = AdditiveControl(3).ScalingValue Else 'If the value is less than maximum value, increment value' If AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue < 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(3).ButtonPosEnable = False AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue + Additive4Increment)
Else 'Else disable increment button' AdditiveControl(3).ButtonPosEnable = True End If
End If End Sub Sub DecrementAmountPump1 Temp_Size = 0 Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive1Increment) If Temp_Size < 0 Then AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue = 0 Else If AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue <= 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(0).ButtonNegEnable = False AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(0).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive1Increment) End If End If End Sub Sub DecrementAmountPump2 Temp_Size = 0 Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive2Increment) If Temp_Size < 0 Then AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue = 0 Else If AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue <= 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(1).ButtonNegEnable = False AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(1).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive2Increment) End If End If End Sub Sub DecrementAmountPump3 Temp_Size = 0 Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive3Increment) If Temp_Size < 0 Then AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue = 0 Else If AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue <= 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(2).ButtonNegEnable = False AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(2).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive3Increment) End If End If End Sub Sub DecrementAmountPump4 Temp_Size = 0 Temp_Size = (AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive4Increment) If Temp_Size < 0 Then AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue = 0 Else If AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue <= 70.8 Then AdditiveControl(3).ButtonNegEnable = False AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue = (AdditiveControl(3).AdditiveOutputValue - Additive4Increment) End If End If
End Sub
'Subroutines for disabling buttons, only one button may be active at a time' Sub close_forward0 AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(0).Empty = False AdditiveControl(0).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_reverse0 AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(0).Empty = False AdditiveControl(0).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_fill0 AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(0).Empty = False End Sub Sub close_empty0 AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(0).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_onextrude0 AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(0).Fill = False AdditiveControl(0).Empty=False End Sub Sub close_forward1 AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(1).Empty = False AdditiveControl(1).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_reverse1 AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(1).Empty = False AdditiveControl(1).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_fill1 AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(1).Empty = False End Sub Sub close_empty1 AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(1).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_onextrude1 AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(1).Fill = False AdditiveControl(1).Empty=False End Sub Sub close_forward2 AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(2).Empty = False AdditiveControl(2).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_reverse2 AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(2).Empty = False AdditiveControl(2).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_fill2 AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(2).Empty = False End Sub Sub close_empty2 AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(2).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_onextrude2 AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(2).Fill = False AdditiveControl(2).Empty=False End Sub Sub close_forward3 AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(3).Empty = False AdditiveControl(3).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_reverse3 AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(3).Empty = False AdditiveControl(3).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_fill3 AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(3).Empty = False End Sub Sub close_empty3 AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(3).Fill = False End Sub Sub close_onextrude3 AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpForward = False AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpReverse = False AdditiveControl(3).Fill = False AdditiveControl(3).Empty=False End Sub
Sub close_on0 AdditiveControl(0).OnExtrude=False AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpForward=False AdditiveControl(0).AdditivePumpReverse=False AdditiveControl(0).Fill=False AdditiveControl(0).Empty=False End Sub
Sub close_on1 AdditiveControl(1).OnExtrude=False AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpForward=False AdditiveControl(1).AdditivePumpReverse=False AdditiveControl(1).Fill=False AdditiveControl(1).Empty=False End Sub
Sub close_on2 AdditiveControl(2).OnExtrude=False AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpForward=False AdditiveControl(2).AdditivePumpReverse=False AdditiveControl(2).Fill=False AdditiveControl(2).Empty=False End Sub
Sub close_on3 AdditiveControl(3).OnExtrude=False AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpForward=False AdditiveControl(3).AdditivePumpReverse=False AdditiveControl(3).Fill=False AdditiveControl(3).Empty=False End Sub
